text: Well, hello there!

autobahn.

And yeah, once we get there there is a cool

So wait for that.

air theater performance.
And it is called Störtebeker Festspiele.

And it takes place in Ralswiek and apparently
this is one of the biggest outdoor theaters
in all of Germany.

It draws thousands of people every night during
the summer.

and explosions and it is very dramatic.

I just hope we can follow the story because
